message: Accept this offer and we can split the money quickly!
You're lowballing me, let's do better than that!
You think you can lowball me now? I'll do better than that!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting closer, but I still want more!
I'm not giving you the upper hand that easily!
Let's meet in the middle, but this time it's my turn to be generous!
I'm not budging, you're going to have to make a better offer!
You're not budging? I'll make you an offer you can't refuse!
50/50, it's time to split the difference!
